name: Bluetooth Bot Battles
description:
This is the perfect game for family gatherings or being around friends where social distancing is a necessity, you can stand or sit far apart and still play against each other!

**Update: New vs CPU feature will allow you to train your Bot's without being connected to another device!

** Update: 11 new Attack Items to use in Battle!

Become the trainer of a team of up to 4 Bot's in this Turn-Based 1 VS 1 stand-alone Bluetooth powered game.

Create a new Bot and challenge a friend to Battle you locally. There is no need for a Wifi or Data connection to play the game.

Each Player device connects to the other via Bluetooth and you will be taken to the Battle Arena where you Battle to see who is victorious.

Gain XP, earn Credits, and level your Bot up through Battling with Friends and Family.

The game comes with 7 different Casing (skins) options for you to choose from, so pick your favorite color scheme.

There is an In-Game store where you can purchase variant Casings, Software, Hardware, and Physical Upgrades for your Bot.

There is 1 Equip slot available for low-level Bot's that you can use to Equip an upgrade Chip or any other Equippable item you purchase in the store.

Store items are purchased using in-game credits, there will NEVER be any In-App purchases or Pay-To-Play associated with this game.

Challenge your Family and Friends and have a fun time!
The working range is limited to the power of your device's Bluetooth transmitter.

Join us on Discord to stay up to date with new features: https://discord.gg/hxAnk4wx
